forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 6 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds under a tapestry of shifting sunlight, with the promise of warmth swaying toward the early evening air. The high temperature hovers around 65 degrees, brushing against the subtle chill of the ocean breeze, carrying with it whispers of westward winds gusting up to 18 mph. As the sun begins its descent, expect temperatures to taper off to about 63, an invitation to shed the midday heat and embrace the refreshing coolness.

Throughout the city, the evening's embrace brings a veil of cloudiness, softening the skyline against a backdrop of muted grays and blues. The low is around 54, perfect for layering a light jacket as the warmth of the day gives way to the gentle touch of night. Visually, the cityscape may appear less vibrant under this pall, yet there is a certain calmness to be found in the gathering clouds. Consider an evening stroll through the Mission, where the aromas of local eateries beckon, or perhaps a quiet moment at one of the waterfront parks, allowing the sound of waves to wash over you as daylight dims into twilight. This afternoon, the blend of mild temperatures and a light breeze offers a pleasant backdrop for everyday adventures in this ever-intriguing city.
